attribs.name: npc_languages
attribs.current: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

attribs.name: npc_immunities
attribs.current: fire, poison, psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

attribs.name: damage_immunities
attribs.current: fire, poison, psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

attribs.name: npc_condition_immunities
attribs.current: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

attribs.name: damage_condition_immunities
attribs.current: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-NOqUQ4yuERv0uhKnLQ5_desc
attribs.current: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-NOqUQ4z2ovit7LwerGp_desc
attribs.current: Any metal melee weapon the golem wields deals an extra 11 (2d10) fire damage on a hit.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-NOqUQ5-IU6crv9O8YzK_desc
attribs.current: The golem regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If the golem takes cold damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the golem's next turn. The golem dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-NOqUQ517gKo230lDo5n_description
attribs.current: The golem makes two melee attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-NOqUQ551jfBcr4zPMyy_description
attribs.current: Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-NOqUQ5DXaVK6rXFB0dK_description
attribs.current: Hit: 23 (2d10 + 7) slashing plus 11 (2d10) fire damage and the target is pulled 10 feet towards the golem.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-NOqUQ5M6vjcyt1mZd3l_description
attribs.current: The golem spews molten iron in a 5-foot wide 60-foot long line. Each creature in that area must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-NOqUQ4yuERv0uhKnLQ5_description
attribs.current: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-NOqUQ4z2ovit7LwerGp_description
attribs.current: Any metal melee weapon the golem wields deals an extra 11 (2d10) fire damage on a hit.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-NOqUQ5-IU6crv9O8YzK_description
attribs.current: The golem regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If the golem takes cold damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the golem's next turn. The golem dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.
